name: HX_RSH_DATA_CAPTURE
description: The HX_RSH_DATA_CAPTURE table contains information about updates to research data capture forms.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the document record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER_ID
columns.description: A history of the unique IDs of users who have updated this form.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: UPDATE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: A history of instants in which this form has been updated.

columns.name: FORM_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: A history of status category IDs for this form.
